Race.SpecificTitle: PW Health Unit -- 4 Mills - PC - 10 Yrs.
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of Tangipahoa, State of Louisiana (the "Parish") be authorized to renew the levy of a special tax of four (4) mills on all property subject to taxation in the Parish (an estimated $2,248,883.00 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year) (the "Tax") for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2017 and ending with the year 2026, for the purpose of maintenance, operation and development of its Parish health units and for the promotion and conservation of public health?

Race.SpecificTitle: Road Lighting Dist. No. 2 -- 16.62 Mills - PC - 10 Yrs
Race.SummaryText:
Road Lighting District No. 2 Proposition
(Tax Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall Road Lighting District No. 2 of the Parish of Tangipahoa, State of Louisiana (the "District") be authorized to renew the levy of a special tax of a sixteen and sixty-two hundredths (16.62) mills on all property subject to taxation in the District (an estimated $34,897.00 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year) (the "Tax"), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2017 and ending with the year 2026, for the purpose of providing and maintaining electric lights on the streets, roads, alleys and public places in the District?

Race.SpecificTitle: Road Lighting Dist. No. 4 -- 15.29 Mills - PC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Road Lighting District No. 4 Proposition
(Tax Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall the Road Lighting District No. 4 of the Parish of Tangipahoa, State of Louisiana (the "District"), be authorized to renew the levy of a special tax of fifteen and twenty-nine hundredths (15.29) mills on all property subject to taxation in the District (an estimated $27,093.00 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year) (the "Tax"), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2017 and ending with the year 2026, for the purpose of providing and maintaining electric lights on the streets, roads, alleys and public places in the District?

Race.SpecificTitle: Hammond Consolidated School Dist. No. 1 -- 3 Mills - SB - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Hammond Consolidated School District No. 1 Proposition
(Millage Continuation)
Race.FullText: Shall Hammond Consolidated School District No. 1 of the Parish of Tangipahoa, State of Louisiana (the "District"), be authorized to levy a special tax of three (3) mills on all property subject to taxation in the District (an estimated $774,790 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2016 and ending with the year 2025, for the purpose of paying the cost of an alternative school program in the District?

Race.SpecificTitle: Fire Protection District No. 1 -- 5 Mills - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Fire Protection District No. 1 Proposition
(Tax Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall Tangipahoa Parish Fire Protection District No. 1 (the "District") be authorized to renew the levy and collection of five (5) mills on all property subject to taxation within said District (an estimated $199,778.00 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year) (the "Tax") for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2017 and ending with the year 2026, for the purpose of purchasing fire protection equipment, maintaining and operating the District's fire protection facilities and equipment, paying the cost of obtaining water, and for salaries of District employees?

Race.SpecificTitle: Recreation Dist. No. 3 -- 15 Mills - BOC - 30 Yrs.
Race.FullText: Shall Recreation District No. 3 of the Parish of Tangipahoa, State of Louisiana (the "District"), levy a tax of fifteen (15) mills (the "Tax") on all the property subject to taxation in the District (an estimated $615,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the Tax for an entire year), for a period of thirty (30) years, beginning with the year 2016 and ending with the year 2045, for the purpose of maintaining, operating, constructing and improving recreational facilities in the District?
